metadata.title: CVE-2022-38090 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Improper isolation of shared resources in some Intel(R) Processors whenusing Intel(R) Software Guard Extensions may allow a privileged user topotentially enable information disclosure via local access.

criterions.comment: intel-microcode: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
